chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 13 has this issue. Thank you for the help,

When the seller receives the package, they will have 3 working days (5 working days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 working days to process a refund if eligible.
The customer must meet the following requirements for a successful return:
✔ Confirm that the product has not been opened by third parties, nor damaged or exposed to liquids.
✔ Confirmed to be in possession of the return label.
✔ Agrees to include accessories and purchase proof inside the package to process the return.
✔ Is aware of having 14 days to use the return label.
Reminder: Once the package is delivered, the seller has 3 days (5 days for computers and household appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 days to process a refund if entitled.

Dear Backcare,

We have cancelled the order and refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
AS
